com.mapbox.services.api.navigation.v5

Class RouteUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.api.navigation.v5.RouteUtils

  • public class RouteUtils
extends Object
    A few utilities to work with RouteLeg objects. This is an experimental API. Experimental APIs are quickly evolving and might change or be removed in minor versions.
    Since:
    1.3.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEFAULT_OFF_ROUTE_THRESHOLD_KM 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RouteUtils()
      RouteUtils constructor using default threshold of 100 meters.
      RouteUtils(double offRouteThresholdKm)
      RouteUtils constructor allowing you to pass in a threshold value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RouteUtils

        public RouteUtils()
        RouteUtils constructor using default threshold of 100 meters.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • RouteUtils

        public RouteUtils(double offRouteThresholdKm)
        RouteUtils constructor allowing you to pass in a threshold value.
        Parameters:
        offRouteThresholdKm - Double value using unit kilometers. This value determines the distance till you are notified.
        Since:
        1.3.0

    • Method Detail

      • getOffRouteThresholdKm

        public double getOffRouteThresholdKm()
        Returns:
        the RouteUtils threshold as a double value; defaults 100 meters.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • isInStep

        public boolean isInStep(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position position,
                        RouteLeg routeLeg,
                        int stepIndex)
                 throws ServicesException,
                        TurfException
        Compute the distance between the position and the step line (the closest point), and checks if it's within the off-route threshold.
        Parameters:
        position - you want to verify is on or near the routeLeg step. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        routeLeg - a directions routeLeg.
        stepIndex - integer index for step in routeLeg.
        Returns:
        true if the position is outside the OffRoute threshold.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • getDistanceToStep

        public double getDistanceToStep(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position position,
                                RouteLeg routeLeg,
                                int stepIndex)
                         throws ServicesException,
                                TurfException
        Computes the distance between the position and the closest point in routeLeg step.
        Parameters:
        position - you want to measure distance to from route. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        routeLeg - a directions routeLeg.
        stepIndex - integer index for step in routeLeg.
        Returns:
        double value giving distance in kilometers.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • getDistanceToNextStep

        public static double getDistanceToNextStep(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position position,
                                           RouteLeg routeLeg,
                                           int stepIndex)
                                    throws ServicesException,
                                           TurfException
        Measures the distance from a position to the end of the route step. The position provided is snapped to the route before distance is calculated.
        Parameters:
        position - you want to measure distance to from route. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        routeLeg - a directions route.
        stepIndex - integer index for step in route.
        Returns:
        double value giving distance in kilometers.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • getDistanceToNextStep

        public static double getDistanceToNextStep(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position position,
                                           RouteLeg routeLeg,
                                           int stepIndex,
                                           String units)
                                    throws ServicesException,
                                           TurfException
        Measures the distance from a position to the end of the route step. The position provided is snapped to the route before distance is calculated.
        Parameters:
        position - you want to measure distance to from route. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        routeLeg - a directions route.
        stepIndex - integer index for step in route.
        Returns:
        double value giving distance in kilometers.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        2.0.0

                                             DirectionsRoute route)
                                      throws TurfException
        Parameters:
        position - you want to measure distance to from route. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.

      • getSnapToRoute

        public static com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position getSnapToRoute(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position position,
                                                                         RouteLeg routeLeg,
                                                                         int stepIndex)
                                                                  throws ServicesException,
                                                                         TurfException
        Snaps given position to a RouteLeg step.
        Parameters:
        position - that you want to snap to routeLeg. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        routeLeg - that you want to snap position to.
        stepIndex - integer index for step in routeLeg.
        Returns:
        your position snapped to the route.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • isOffRoute

        public boolean isOffRoute(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position position,
                          RouteLeg routeLeg)
                   throws ServicesException,
                          TurfException
        Method to check whether the position given is outside the routeLeg using the threshold.
        Parameters:
        position - you want to verify is on or near the routeLeg. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        routeLeg - a directions routeLeg.
        Returns:
        true if the position is beyond the threshold limit from the routeLeg.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • getClosestStep

        public int getClosestStep(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position position,
                          RouteLeg routeLeg)
                   throws TurfException,
                          ServicesException
        Get the closest routeLeg step to the given position. Ties will go to the furthest step in the routeLeg.
        Parameters:
        position - that you want to get closest routeLeg step to.
        routeLeg - a directions routeLeg.
        Returns:
        integer step index in routeLeg.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - if error occurs Mapbox API related.
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • getGeometryRemainingOnRoute

        public static com.mapbox.services.commons.geojson.LineString getGeometryRemainingOnRoute(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position position,
                                                                                         DirectionsRoute route)
                                                                                  throws TurfException
        Get the remaining route geometry from the position provided to the end of the directions route. This is useful when the user location is traversing along the route and you don't want the past route geometry to show on the map.
        Parameters:
        position - the new starting postion of the route geometry. If using for navigation, this would typically be the users current location.
        route - a Directions route.
        Returns:
        the LineString representing the new route geometry.
        Throws:
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        2.0.0
